text: <!here|@here> Hey folks, so sorry to do this but we're going to have to move the signage presentation as a lot of the folks in that (avery, james, ivan) will now be in SF for a care kickoff. Hopefully this simply gives us more time to get prepped. :slightly_smiling_face: You'll see an updated invitation when we can find the right time slot. Holler with questions.
Sounds good, thanks for the update
Hey Ally/Abby I have to be at home on Monday for an HVAC guy but can join the presentation via Hangouts
I think that's fine. Ideally we'd have you there in person but I know schedules are really though so I think we should keep it to Monday if possible.
